A factory for connection matrices

getConnectionMatrix

public byte[][] getConnectionMatrix(org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IAtomContainer molecule)
Returns the connection matrix for the molecule where 1 indicates two atoms are connected and 0 indicates they are not. The matrix is symmetrical

Parameters:
molecule -
Returns:

getBondElectronMatrix

public byte[][] getBondElectronMatrix(org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IAtomContainer molecule)
Creates a Bond Electron Matrix (BE-Matrix) for the provided molecule. These matrices are also known as UGI matrices. At the moment this is not a true BE-Matrix as the lone pairs are not added

Returns:
